pageContext.claim: “Consumer Sentiment hit its highest level in 17 years this year. Sentiment fell 11% in 2015, an Obama year, and rose 16% since the Election, #TrumpTime!”
pageContext.analysis: It's possible the president is mixing up his consumer indexes. Consumer sentiment was higher in January 2004 than it is today. Plus, it fell just 5.5 percent in 2015 and has fallen since the election.
